com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util

Class RandomDecisionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.util.RandomDecisionTree

  • public class RandomDecisionTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A Decision tree for use in random forests.

    Author:
    Team 2412.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Node lastUsedNode
      A record of the last used node, for recursion purposes.
      private int numberOfVariables
      The total number of variables.
      private static Node root
      The root tree node.
      (package private) boolean[] usedVariables
      A list of which variables have been used so far in the tree.
      private java.lang.String[] variables
      A list of variable keys, in String form.
      private int variableSubset
      The number of variables to randomly select and use at each node.
      private VarianceMinimizer varianceMinimizer
      An optimizer/minimizer class for minimizing variance at a split.

      • getDataSubset

        private DataPoint[] getDataSubset(DataPoint[] currentData,
                        int index,
                        double cutoff,
                        boolean positiveNode)
        Find the data that would follow a branch after a decision node.

        Parameters:
        currentData - the data to isolate from
        index - the variable index to branch based on.
        cutoff - the cutoff value.
        positiveNode - whether or not to test for successes (true) or failures (false).
        Returns:
        the isolated data.
